p: Semen and urine samples were collected at home inside sterile containers by the patient on March 27th after granting his informed consent and were brought to the Laboratory of Virology, Department of Molecular Medicine, “Sapienza” University of Rome from a researcher wearing appropriate personal protective equipment. Viral RNA from 140 µl of seminal fluid in toto and of urine was extracted using QIAamp viral RNA kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturer’s protocol. Ten µl of extracted RNA was reverse-transcribed and simultaneously amplified using a Real time RT PCR system (RealStar SARS-CoV2 RT PCR, Altona Diagnostics) targeting E and S viral genes.
